abstract: The Justice Department’s suit against Standard & Poor’s over mortgage-related securities says computer programs assessing risk were manipulated to ensure high ratings and big profits.
snippet: The Justice Department’s suit against Standard & Poor’s over mortgage-related securities says computer programs assessing risk were manipulated to ensure high ratings and big profits.

headline.main: U.S. Contends S.& P. Purposely Used Faulty Models
headline.print_headline: U.S. Contends S.&P. Purposely Used Faulty Models

keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
